content.p: Chile's international scholarship programme CONICYT (Comision Nacional de Investigacion Cientifica Y Tecnologica) is Chile's government department for scientific research, technology and development. CONICYT offers national and international scholarships for high-achieving Chilean students to study postgraduate masters and PhD degree programmes in a variety of subject areas, including sciences, architecture, engineering and business. The University of Nottingham is proud to be one of CONICYT's partner universities in the UK. See the CONICYT website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Chile webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Chile. See the CONICYT website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines. Offered by Comision Nacional de Investigacion Cientifica Y Tecnologica (CONICYT)
